summary: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.
cast: Giulietta Masina|François Périer|Franca Marzi|Dorian Gray|Aldo Silvani|Ennio Girolami|Mario Passante|Christian Tassou|Amedeo Nazzari|Gianni Baghino|Franco Balducci|Ciccio Barbi|Jusy Boncinelli|Loretta Capitoli|Leo Catozzo|Dominique Delouche|Edda Evangelista|Franco Fabrizi|Riccardo Fellini|Ines Ferrari|Biagio Gambini|Giovanna Gattinoni|Amedeo Girardi|Pina Gualandri|Elio Mauro|Nino Milano|Jean Mollier|Sandro Moretti|Sergio Parlato|Mimmo Poli|Polidor|María Luisa Rolando|Vittorio Tosti
title: Las noches de Cabiria
